sentences.en: Allowance , An intentional difference in sizes of two mating parts.
sentences.cn: 两个配件之间的预留的尺寸差.

sentences.en: Canclusions: Mating of multiple methods, drug dependence of Morphine can be with drawn.
sentences.cn: 结论: 多种方法配合, 吗啡类药物依赖是可以彻底戒除的.

sentences.en: Clean the exhaust manifold and cylinder head mating surfaces.
sentences.cn: 清洁排气歧管和汽缸头配合面.

sentences.en: Deployed properly, they bring the rewards of status and better mating opportunities.
sentences.cn: 开展得当, 它们会彰显身份地位,带来更好的交际机会.

sentences.en: Disc is guided by the mating surface of the seat.
sentences.cn: 可通过所匹配的阀座表面导引阀瓣.

sentences.en: Do not make sexual advances unless you are given the mating signal.
sentences.cn: 不要与别人发生性行为,除非你得到了发生关系的信号.

sentences.en: I thought you were giving up on the mating dance.
sentences.cn: 我以为你们俩己经放弃不继续跳这段求偶之舞了呢!

sentences.en: Mating connectors with out of tolerance pin depths may destroy the connector.
sentences.cn: 若与超出插针深度容差的连接器匹配,则可能会损坏连接器.

sentences.en: Mating flange ID must match sleeve ID.
sentences.cn: 配套法兰内径必须与套管内径匹配.

sentences.en: MISMATCH: A discontinuity caused by incorrect mating of tool components.
sentences.cn: 错配: 由错误搭配零件引起的中断.

sentences.en: That is because it breaks up optimal mating patterns.
sentences.cn: 那是因为它打破了理想的配偶模式.

sentences.en: The male bird performs a sort of mating dance before copulating with the female.
sentences.cn: 这种雄鸟在与雌鸟交尾以前要跳一种交欢舞.

sentences.en: Their mating calls left no room for doubt.
sentences.cn: 他们求爱的呼声不容置疑.

sentences.en: They want the males to mate with wild females.
sentences.cn: 他们想让这些雄性动物和野生的雌性动物交配。

sentences.en: They were hif by mating prices.
sentences.cn: 他们是物价飞涨的受害者.

sentences.en: This allows the pair to mate properly and stops the hen from staying in the nest.
sentences.cn: 这可以使这一对正常交配同时也阻止雌禽待在窝里。

sentences.en: With lifetime 100,000 mating cycle , application include: set - top box, smart meter.
sentences.cn: 使用寿命可达10万次, 主要应用于机顶盒, 三表及各类计价器.

words.tran_cn: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物
（动物等的）[生物]交配，交尾；配套；（植物等的）杂交

trans.tran_cn: 交配；使配对；使紧密配合（mate的现在分词）
trans.tran_en: When animals mate, a male and a female have sex in order to produce young
